summary: 1 JULY 2019 ENTERING BILLINGS MT WE LOST OUR BRAKES ON OUR 5TH WHEEL TRAILER.  STOPPED AT RV DEALER WHO ADDED BRAKE FLUID.  BRAKES WORKED UNTIL WE ARRIVED IN EUGENE OR 15 JULY 2019.  RV DEALER INSPECTED THE BRAKES, ONLY FOUND THE BRAKES PADS TO BE WORN OUT (REPLACED). FOUND OUT LATER THEY HAD TOPPED OFF THE BRAKE FLUID.  BRAKES WORKED UNTIL WE ARRIVED IN PORT ORANGE FL 5 OCT 2019.  TOOK TO ANOTHER RV DEALER AND FOUND THE BRAKE LINE FROM DRIVER'S SIDE TO PASSENGER SIDE OR 5TH WHEEL HAD SMALL HOLES AND WAS LEAKING BRAKE FLUID.  REPLACED BRAKE LINE.  BRAKES STILL WORKING AS OF TODAY.
